channel.title: Jedr's Tech Blog
channel.description: Blog by Jedr Blaszyk. Bikepacking, photography & tech.

item.title: Question Answering System with LangChain, HuggingFace, and Elasticsearch
item.description: Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for question answering using data from this blog as the knowledge source. The entire RAG pipeline and the LLM can run locally in a notebook.
item.content:encoded: Let’s build a retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) system for question answering that can run locally in a notebook. We’ll use the content…... Read more >>>

item.title: Elastic Data Connectors - Elasticsearch Ingestion Made Simple
item.description: Overview of a new, lightweight data connectors framework integrated with the Elastic stack that can ingest data from any source into the Elasticsearch index.
item.content:encoded: In any search application, the is an underlying ingestion pipeline that indexes the data. While developers often focus on speedy searches…... Read more >>>

item.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 3: Running at Scale
item.description: Exploring strategies to scale up Apache Lucene to serve high-traffic applications. Looking at how serverless architectures can enable cost-effective scalability.
item.content:encoded: Let’s explore real-world solutions that enable us to deploy and operate Apache Lucene at scale and discuss the advantages that a stateless…... Read more >>>

item.title: Nrtsearch Tutorial - Indexing Web Content for Search
item.description: Let's use nrtsearch search engine to support website search with custom ranking and results highlighting. I'm also building a website crawler, data indexer and Search UI to interact with the system.
item.content:encoded: Let’s use nrtsearch - an open-source search engine built by Yelp - to support text search for any website. In this tutorial, I’m using my…... Read more >>>

item.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 2: Search and Ranking
item.description: Diving deep into Lucene's search and ranking - data structures, query types, concurrent searching and custom scoring.
item.content:encoded: In the last post Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 1: The Index, we took a deep dive to look at the building blocks of the Lucene index. Here…... Read more >>>

item.title: The Tech Stack of Fast, Free, and Customizable Blog
item.description: Building a blog with GatsbyJS, GraphQL, MDX and Github Pages. Customization, open-source and performance - completely for free.
item.content:encoded: To Blog or Not We are living in the digital age - publishing content has never been easier thanks to social platform tech giants. After all,…... Read more >>>

item.title: Exploring Apache Lucene - Part 1: The Index
item.description: Exploring Apache Lucene's core concepts - inverted index, insertions and deletions.
item.content:encoded: When I joined Yelp in 2020, as a software engineer, I became part of the Ranking Platform team. The team is responsible for the development…... Read more >>>

item.title: Geometric Deep Learning - an overview
item.description: Series of posts covering learnings from my MEng thesis "Geometric Deep Learning for Subcortical Brain Shape Analysis".
item.content:encoded: Non-Euclidean domains Spectral methods Spatial methods Why spatial is better than spectral Introduction by example: GCN implemented in…... Read more >>>
